items.title: Scientists reverse Alzheimer’s in mice with groundbreaking nanotech
bullets: • Scientists reverse Alzheimer’s in mice with groundbreaking nanotech approach
• Instead of carrying drugs, the nanoparticles themselves triggered natural clearance of amyloid-β proteins
• This restored blood-brain barrier function and reversed memory loss
• Results point to a revolutionary new path for treating neurodegenerative diseases

• A federal district court judge struck down the program on November 10, 2022, prompting the government to stop taking applications
• A decision is expected by late June or early July

items.title: Climate Change Made Hurricane Melissa Four Times More Likely, Study Suggests
bullets: • A new rapid attribution study suggests human-induced climate change made the deadly tropical cyclone four times more likely
• The storm, which reached Category 5, has killed at least 40 people across the Caribbean so far
• Winds reaching speeds of 185 miles per hour and torrential rain flattened entire neighborhoods, forced more than 25,000 people to seek cover in shelters

• Middlesex Water Co
• and 3M agreed to settle the class action almost four years after it was filed

items.title: Arcade Fire’s Win Butler and Régine Chassagne Announce Separation
bullets: • Arcade Fire co-founders Win Butler and Régine Chassagne have announced they are separating
• The couple married in 2003, the year before Arcade Fire released Funeral
• In 2022, several women came forward to accuse Butler of sexual misconduct
• Arcade Fire returned this year with Pink Elephant, their first album since the allegations

items.title: Why an interstellar comet has scientists excited
bullets: • Comet 3I/ATLAS is only the third such interstellar object to enter our solar system in recorded history
• It's the only chance to observe the object before it moves out of the solar system
• Researchers say nickel vapor was detected in the gas surrounding the comet

• Two federal judges on Friday ordered the Trump administration to use emergency funding to provide the benefits

items.title: It sounds creepy, but these scientific breakthroughs could save lives

items.title: GTA VI developer accused of union busting in mass firings
